name: Sky Fall (Zuko)
description:
Sky Fall is a simple game I made in less than 24 hours. You take the role of a red square that must avoid the blocks falling from the sky. Each coloured block does something different when the player stands on it.

  • Red - Instantly Kills
  • Orange - Breaks
  • Yellow - Increases Movement Speed
  • Green - Increases Jump Height
  • Blue - Decreases Movement Speed
  • Purple - Launches player up into the sky like a trampoline

I might improve on the game at some point but im not sure, it was mainly to learn some new mechanics of the unity engine.
